Masuda Kousuke Gekijou Gag Manga Biyori +

Good Comments: The only one subbing it, and doing a good job at that. That is, had they cared to actually do it in the first place.

Subbed Projects.Show Name: Masuda Kousuke Gekijou Gag Manga Biyori 3

Good Comments: They subbed it! And they subbed it well!
Only team that picked up this amazing series. They have pretty decent subs.
Bad Comments: A cursive font is used instead of a simple sans font, which makes it pretty unreadable. That said, this is the only group that has made the effort to create English subs, so the effort must be appreciated nevertheless
